entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine RunAsync_CanFilterHealthChecks #56245
  • Validate local development workflows in CI #56237
  • .Net 9 Blazor compilation bug #56236
  • Missing required value for constructor parameter #56234
  • `DistributedSession` tries to refresh non-existent keys #56233
  • Published size regression: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #56231
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #56230
  • Perf regression: json_middleware, mapaction #56229
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #56228
  • Incorrect Logging Level for JSON Format Errors in POST Requests #56227

Closed

  • Build in AuthenticationStateProvider breaks after trimming #56207
    9.0-preview7
  • asp-append-version only works for StaticFiles in wwwroot #56224
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo #56243
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #56242
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #56241
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #56240
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #56239
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #56238
  • Properties with the `[Required]` attribute should be required in the generated OpenAPI document #56212
    9.0-preview6
  • [9.0-preview.4] OpenAPI response does get served if a static file with the same path exists as a file #55833
  • User Login Session could not maintain in Blazor Client Server Interactive Auto render mode. #56203
  • Properties with the [DefaultValue] attribute should have a default value in the generated OpenAPI document #56215
    9.0-preview6

PullRequests

Created

  • Quarantine RunAsync_CanFilterHealthChecks #56246
    area-healthchecks
  • Warn when [Authorize] is overridden by [AllowAnymous] from "farther" away #56244
    area-infrastructure
  • Use Convert.ToHexStringLower() #56235
    community-contribution, area-security
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a7f443b` to `1d17ea1` #56232
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Add codefixer and completion provider to install OpenAPI package from extension methods #55963
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview6
  • Add support for processing RequiredAttribute on OpenApi schemas #56225
    area-mvc, area-minimal, 9.0-preview6
  • Add support for processing DefaultValueAttribute in OpenApi schemas #56219
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • [Blazor] Consume fingerprinted assets in MVC and Blazor #56045
    area-blazor
  • Update C# code for #29448 #56086
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add support for reference-based schemas in OpenAPI document #56175
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Add logging to MVC tests #55592
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun
